direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process ISBN codes but perform different validations (calculation vs. validation).
Both methods involve calculations based on positional values, though for different purposes.
Both methods involve converting values to check digits, though for different ISBN types.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of check digit instances is required before calculating ISBN check digits.
Validation of the code length is required before calculating the check digit.
Both methods verify check digits and handle similar exceptions.
